thread.title: This Couple Jamming Out To Prince While Cooking Will Bring A Big Smile To Your Face - BuzzFeed News
thread.title_full: This Couple Jamming Out To Prince While Cooking Will Bring A Big Smile To Your Face - BuzzFeed News

author: Tanya Chen
title: This Couple Jamming Out To Prince While Cooking Will Bring A Big Smile To Your Face - BuzzFeed News
text:
“I posted it for me to simply look back on whenever I needed a reason to smile,” she said. “Young black love,” she captioned the video.
For awhile, the video sat quietly on her page — and appeared to truly be for Lynae’s eyes only.
ID: 10750465 4. But randomly — and only in the last few weeks, really — the video went viral on Tumblr. People who’ve come across it are so smitten with Lynae and Castillo. View this image › 
ID: 10750986 5. And it’s making people both reminiscent of past relationships, and hopeful for future ones. iambicsoul.tumblr.com 
jennettically.tumblr.com 
  ID: 10751134 6. Someone described the video as “this feeling of carefreeness and being with someone that takes all the weight of the world feeling off your shoulders and lets you be happy with life.” View this image › 
theparadoxofmymind.tumblr.com ID: 10751157 7. “It shows just how amazing it is to completely be yourself with the person that you love,” Lynae said in response to all of the comments. View this image › 
hoodprincesa.tumblr.com ID: 10751198 8. Many others are just really impressed with Castillo’s moves, “which cracks me up every time that I watch it because it’s one of my favorite things about him,” Lynae said. View this image › 
Des Lynae ID: 10750473 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
Tanya Chen is a social news reporter for BuzzFeed and is based in New York. Contact Tanya Chen at tanya.chen@buzzfeed.com . Got a confidential tip? Submit it here .
